entities.name: iTunes
entities.description: iTunes is a media player, media library, online store, and mobile device management application developed by Apple.

entities.name: Apple Music
entities.description: Apple Music is a subscription-based music streaming service that offers access to millions of songs.

entities.name: Apple Arcade
entities.description: Apple Arcade is a subscription service that offers access to a library of premium games.

entities.name: Apple TV
entities.description: Apple TV is a digital media player and streaming device developed by Apple.

entities.name: Apple Podcasts
entities.description: Apple Podcasts is a platform for discovering, subscribing to, and listening to podcasts.

entities.name: Apple Books
entities.description: Apple Books is an e-book reading and store application developed by Apple.

entities.name: Apple Fitness+
entities.description: Apple Fitness+ is a subscription service that provides workout videos and fitness guidance.

entities.name: Apple News+
entities.description: Apple News+ is a subscription service that provides access to hundreds of magazines and premium news sources.

entities.name: Apple One
entities.description: Apple One is a subscription bundle that includes multiple Apple services at a discounted price.

entities.name: Game Center
entities.description: Game Center is a social gaming network for iOS and macOS that allows users to connect with friends and track achievements.

entities.name: 14 days
entities.description: The time period within which a user can cancel their order after receiving their receipt.

entities.name: 24 hours
entities.description: The maximum time before the start of the latest Paid Subscription period that a user can be charged.

entities.name: Right of cancellation
entities.description: Users have the right to cancel their order within 14 days of receipt without giving any reason.

entities.name: Subscription services cancellation
entities.description: Subscription services can only be cancelled following the initial subscription and not upon each automatic renewal.

entities.name: Usage Rules
entities.description: Users must follow specific rules regarding the use of Services and Content as outlined in the Agreement.

entities.name: Family Sharing
entities.description: Family Sharing allows eligible subscriptions to be shared among up to six members of a Family.

entities.name: Paid Subscriptions
entities.description: Paid Subscriptions automatically renew until cancelled in the Manage Subscriptions section of your account settings.

entities.name: Content availability
entities.description: Terms related to Services and Content types that may not be available in the user's Home Country.

entities.name: Privacy Policy
entities.description: User's use of Services is subject to Apple's Privacy Policy.

entities.name: Third-party materials
entities.description: Apple is not responsible for third-party materials included within or linked from the Content or the Services.
